title: All revenue bills originate in the House

content.question: The Constitution states that all revenue bills must originate in

choices.label: the United States House of Representatives
the Office of Management and Budget

content.answer: the United States House of Representatives

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress
